ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Dark Shaman
ComicInfo.Summary:
The newest Grimm Universe series continues as the spirits from the Ancient burial ground begin to wreak havoc on those who've disrupted their graves!
Evil Shamans
Co-ed Deaths!
